Vehicle Tracking Access Control System on Kerala Roads | PRL

http://www.prlog.org/11804301-vehicle-tracking-access-control-system-on-kerala-roads.html

Security Vehicle Tracking Access Control System for Kerala Roads are based on Access Control Security RFID Scanner and Detection System. The entire tracking Magic is made possible with the global Positioning System or GPS Technology for Vehicle Access Control System. If you want to locate the real time position of your Vehicle , you can use the real time Vehicle Access Control System for streaming the Network. GPS vehicle tracker stores Variety of Information such as Speed, Landmark and Current Position. It works with a complicated architecture, but the user interface of a Vehicle Tracker Access Control System is quite Simple. The Data about a missed Vehicle can be traced and collected very easily which can be uploaded to a Network for further Evaluation and Analysis.

There is no better way to keep a check on your Valuable Vehicle than a GPS Tracking. Car Owners can be in a very Comfortable Position without worrying about any Vehicle Theft. You can now be comfortable after installing a Vehicle Tracking Access Control System, knowing that your vehicles will always be under your supervision. The heart of this Vehicle Tracking Access Control System is the constellation of 24 GPS satellites that constantly orbit the Earth. This constellation was launched in the 1980's by the U.S. Department of Defense. Designed and deployed initially for military use, the system was opened up to civilian use shortly after its inception. These satellites operate 24/7/365 at no direct cost to the end-user.

Log on to : http://www.visiontux.in/accesscontrol.html

The INTERNET is the final component of the GPS Vehicle Tracking Access Control System. It provides the conduit into and out of the network servers that store all of the location and event data transmitted by the device. The data transmitted by the Vehicle Tracking Access Control Device goes through the cellular network, into the Internet, where it ends up stored in a database on a web server. The web server stores this information until queried by the end-user from a mapping web site. Almost magically, this all happens in less than a second.

Visit : http://www.visiontux.in/rfidtags.html

Locating a stolen vehicle is the most obvious use of a Vehicle Tracking Access Control System. It could save enough time for police to be able to apprehend the thief before the vehicle is damaged. It is such a valuable tool in finding stolen vehicles that insurance companies offer discounts on auto insurance of 5 - 15% if a device is installed in a vehicle. For some families, it will also make sense to install a simple tracking device in every farm, construction or recreational vehicle also.

Go through : http://www.visiontux.in/products.html

When installed in a car, a vehicle tracking system can also identify and alert you to erratic driving. This might mean a thief is trying to escape the area where the car was stolen. It might also mean something is medically wrong with the person driving the vehicle. The devices that include a camera installed on the dash board can even allow you to identify the driver.

Today, with crime on the rise, a person really need to have a GPS tracking Access Control System in their vehicle, especially if it is of a new make and model. The GPS Vehicle Tracking System is great if you want an anti theft device, or if you own a company, you will be able to track and monitor your employees driving habits and location. You obviously get what you pay for in just about anything you buy, and that also applies to GPS Vehicle Tracking Systems. Less expensive systems will function adequately, however will be lacking in certain functions that are inherent in the more expensive, sophisticated systems. If you have a company and are thinking of getting a fleet management system, then this is a wise investment, because you will be able to better manage for your fleet, reduce insurance costs and run a more efficient business. As these Asset Tracking Access Control Devices will pay off in the long run and also keep your investments secure.

Contact us for Attractive Offers @ aimy@visiontux.net

Mob : 91 9995810008, 0484 – 4021911

91 9995810007

Visit : http://www.visiontux.in

How a Boom Barrier can help you for Efficient Security of a

http://www.prlog.org/11810333-how-boom-barrier-can-help-you-for-efficient-security-of-building.html

According to your purpose of Operation an Automatic Security Gate or Boom Barrier varies in Size, Shape and Operation. If you want to Protect your Home or Business an Automatic Security Gate is an added Security. A Gate makes much harder to get in and out easily. Automatic Security Gates include various Mechanical Components such as Door Barriers, Electronic Door Locks and Boom Barriers which will restrict access to People whose Identity can not be Verified by a Smart Card, RFID Card Reader or Biometric Sensor.

The Capabilities of an Access Control System Boom Barrier Gates varies greatly. [i]Boom Barrier Security Gates have been designed to handle Single Door, Multiple Doors, Turnstile Security Gates, Film Theater Security Electronic Door Lock[/i] or aHospital Security Block System to control the entry and the exit of Vehicles. Nowadays a complete Automatic Security Boom Barrier Security Gate System is inefficient and incomplete due to lack of efficient Software. Basically these Software controls every movement with the help of integrated Hardware and Mechanical Components.

It is better and advisable to use a Security Boom Barrier Gate System instead of using a Security Guard since the Boom Barrier Security Gates are Automatic and Time Consuming. An Access Control Boom Barrier Gate is an Automated System which is highly efficient Security System for Builders and Flats to Confirm their Security from the outside World. Boom Barrier Security Gates Secure your Homes and Buildings from unauthorized entry of Vehicles or Persons into your Compound.

Log on to : http://www.visiontux.in/boombarrier.html

Go through : http://www.visiontux.in/turnstile.html

There are variety of Home Surveillance Systems and Access Control Security Devices such as CCTV Cameras, Theft Control Devices, Biometric Door Locks, Fingerprint Automatic Security Locks and more. But the Boom Barrier Door Security Gate System is the most Popular and Efficient among all these Security Devices. Multiple Buildings have Boom Barrier Security System as Parking Gates. A CCTV Surveillance System attached to a DVR Security Device can be attached to an Automatic Security Boom Barrier for Proper Record management of Entry and Exit Security into a Building or an IT Park.

Visit : http://www.visiontux.in/products.html

So Don 't be afraid of applying for a Boom Barrier Security Gate for your new Building or Apartment which is far better than putting a CCTV or Theft Control Device for stopping employee theft and providing a safer workplace. Also an Automatic Security Boom Barrier is keeping your Family, Business Solutions and Assets with Safety, Security and Comfort. A Car parking Boom Barrier is an efficient Device which has useful Properties such as

It prevents the unauthorized entry of vehicles into a particular property.
It prevents the entry of unrecognized vehicles into a property. (This can be done through attaching mechanisms like card swipe or license plate recognition to the barrier.)
It monitors the entry and exit of vehicles.
It records the registration number of vehicles parked in the locality.

Automatic Door Opener Car Parking Boom Barriers can be applied to

Shopping malls
Residential buildings
Public buildings like hotels, colleges and hospitals
Parking areas for staff in commercial buildings

Visit : http://www.visiontux.in/flapbarriers.html

http://www.prlog.org/11845448-how-criminal-investigation-easier-with-fingerprints.html

Fingerprint Scanners Cochin are efficient Identification and Personal Detection Systems for Human Identification with Access Card RFID Card Fingerprint Readers Kerala and Bar Code Readers. Fingerprint Readers Cochin and Kerala are working on the Principle of Access Control Thumb Identification System. Most of the Access Control Fingerprint Thumb Punching Machines Ernakulam are used for Attendance Identification and as a Fingerprint Thumb Attendance Reader.
